name: Deep Space (itch) (Error Code 864G)
description:
This was a fun project to work on. I tried to make an actually good background this time and I think I did decently. 
~864G

This is a sequel of sorts to: https://error-code-864g.itch.io/gravitational

Info:

WASD: to move

Space: Switch gravity

The longer you spend in the air, the faster you get.
